name: MouseEvent.buttons
description: The MouseEvent.buttons read-only property indicates which buttons are pressed on the mouse (or other input device) when a mouse event is triggered.

refs.name: UI Events
refs.description: The definition of 'MouseEvent.buttons' in UI Events.
